name: Pair_zipTest
description: Unit tests for the Pair.zip method, which zips two lists into a list of pairs.

test_cases.name: testZipStrictEqualSizes
test_cases.description: Tests the zip functionality of Pair when both lists have equal sizes and strict mode is enabled.

test_cases.name: testZipStrictDifferentSizes
test_cases.description: Tests the zip functionality of Pair when lists have different sizes and strict mode is enabled, expecting an AssertionError.

test_cases.name: testZipNonStrict
test_cases.description: Tests the zip functionality of Pair when lists have different sizes and strict mode is disabled.
